issue.title: [CF 517] Rune of Power
issue.body:
It was requested that I make a ticket involving Rune of Power on the beta, since it may require some research into getting it to work correctly.

Thanks for the assistance.


> Posted by CurseForge user trigunwow | Imported from CurseForge issue #517 | Raw

comments.body:
I need a lvl 90 mage to give me a combat log of them casting rune of power.

I also need to know if it despawns if you get too far away from it (say, the distance from the orgrimmar training dummies to the front gate) or it if persists and only despawns when its timer expires.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

The Totem icon type has been re-purposed for Mages to track this in r636


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
